translation.en: MANDARIN SUBTITLES IN WHITE [ TAIWANESE SUBTITLES IN BRACKETS ]
translation.de: UNTERTITEL IN MANDARIN IN WEISS [ UNTERTITEL IN TAIWANESISCH IN KLAMMERN ]

translation.en: [Pin-Jui in Mandarin] My father died when I was a year old.
translation.de: Mein Vater starb, als ich ein Jahr alt war.

translation.en: My mother did her best to take care of me on her own,
translation.de: Meine Mutter tat ihr Bestes, um mich allein großzuziehen,

translation.en: but after she lost her job, she couldn't afford to provide for me anymore.
translation.de: aber als sie ihren Job verlor, konnte sie nicht mehr für mich aufkommen.

translation.en: She left me with my grandparents, who lived in the rice fields,
translation.de: Sie ließ mich bei meinen Großeltern, die in den Reisfeldern lebten,

translation.en: while she looked for work so we could be together again.
translation.de: um Arbeit zu suchen, damit wir wieder zusammen sein konnten.

translation.en: I missed my mother.
I felt alone without her.
translation.de: Ich fühlte mich allein ohne sie.

translation.en: So alone that, sometimes,
I saw things because I wanted to see them.
translation.de: Dinge sah, weil ich sie sehen wollte.

translation.en: [in Mandarin] Inspection.
Who lives here?
[in Mandarin] I'm going to take a look.
[in Mandarin] Come on. Let's go.
[in English] Sorry I was a little late.
I didn't even know you were in Taiwan until Bobby asked me to pick you up.
translation.de: Ich wusste nicht, dass du in Taiwan warst, bis Bobby anrief.

translation.en: How was your trip?
Fine.
[Pin-Jui in Mandarin] For a few moments, I forgot my loneliness.
translation.de: Für einen Moment vergaß ich meine Einsamkeit.

translation.en: Yuan and I spent much of the next year together.
translation.de: Yuan und ich verbrachten das folgende Jahr zusammen.

translation.en: It was one of the happiest times of my life.
translation.de: Es war eine der glücklichsten Phasen meines Lebens.

translation.en: After my mother found a job and I moved back to my hometown,
translation.de: Als meine Mutter Arbeit hatte und ich wieder zu ihr zog,

translation.en: I thought I'd never see her again.
translation.de: dachte ich, ich würde sie nie mehr sehen.

translation.en: But then, many years later, fate intervened.
translation.de: Doch viele Jahre später griff das Schicksal ein.

translation.en: [in Mandarin] One more dance.
I'm going outside to get some fresh air.
translation.de: Ich gehe raus an die Luft.

translation.en: Maybe when I come back. Maybe.
[man] She's beautiful.
What the hell is she doing with you?
translation.de: Was zum Teufel will sie mit dir?

translation.en: We met when we were kids, when I was living with my grandparents.
translation.de: Wir lernten uns als Kinder kennen, als ich bei meinen Großeltern lebte.

translation.en: She moved here recently, and it just sort of happened.
translation.de: Sie zog neulich her, und es passierte.

translation.en: Some guys get all the luck.
You have a girl like that, you ask her to marry you.
translation.de: So einem Mädchen macht man einen Heiratsantrag.

translation.en: Her parents would never allow it. They're well off.
translation.de: Das würden ihre reichen Eltern nie zulassen.

translation.en: I'm a poor kid from a nothing village.
[man] Better have fun with her while you can, then.
translation.de: Dann amüsier dich mit ihr, solange es geht.

translation.en: I guess so.
I think you'll like this one.
translation.de: Ich glaube, das wird dir gefallen.

translation.en: Where'd you learn to dance?
Movies.
What movies?
American movies.
Someday, I'll go there.
I'll bring my mom.
She won't have to work anymore.
translation.de: Dann muss sie nicht mehr arbeiten.

translation.en: Can I come?
Of course.
Who else am I going to dance with there?
translation.de: Mit wem soll ich dort sonst tanzen?

translation.en: Maybe Faye Dunaway.
Never mind. Don't come.
You would only get in the way of me and Faye.
translation.de: Sonst stehst du nur zwischen mir und Faye.

translation.en: I'm hungry. Should we get something to eat?
translation.de: Ich habe Hunger. Gehen wir was essen?

translation.en: Let's go to Yuelu.
No way. That's too expensive.
It's fine. My treat.
translation.de: Schon gut. Ich lade dich ein.

translation.en: I can't let you do that.
I want to take you somewhere special.
translation.de: Ich will mit dir in ein besonderes Lokal.

translation.en: We're going to Yuelu.
No more discussion.
You're the most stubborn person I've ever met.
Hello. Have you dined with us before?
translation.de: Hallo. Haben Sie bereits früher bei uns gegessen?

translation.en: Yes. Many times.
Really? Then you've seen the menu.
translation.de: Ja? Dann haben Sie die Karte gesehen?

translation.en: Prices are on the right.
Of course. We come here all the time.
I'm surprised you don't recognize us.
Fine, then. What would you like to order?
translation.de: Na gut. Was möchten Sie bestellen?

translation.en: We'll start with the fried fish...
translation.de: Wir fangen mit dem gebratenen Fisch an...

translation.en: and also the bitter melon...
and a bowl of beef noodle soup.
Great. Thank you.
-Is that it? -That's it.
Right away.
Screw that guy.
He doesn't think we can pay? Who is he to judge us?
translation.de: Denkt er, wir können nicht zahlen? Für wen hält er sich?

translation.en: Is he wrong, though?
Not really, no.
Hey. They've been rude to us all night.
translation.de: Die waren den ganzen Abend unhöflich zu uns.

translation.en: Let's play a trick on them.
No. What are you talking about?
On the count of three, let's run out the door.
-No, come on. -[audience applauding]
Get ready. One, two, three!
[waiter] Hey! Come back, you bastards!
You're crazy.
I want to spend the whole night with you, but I have to go home.
translation.de: Ich will die ganze Nacht bei dir sein, aber ich muss nach Hause.

translation.en: Why don't you ever let me see your place?
translation.de: Warum zeigst du mir nie, wo du wohnst?

translation.en: It's too fancy.
If I let you see it, you'll want me for my money,
translation.de: Dann willst du mich nur wegen des Geldes,

translation.en: instead of my good looks and charm.
translation.de: nicht weil ich attraktiv und charmant bin.

translation.en: I thought you were sleeping.
Just out with some friends. Go to sleep, Ma.
[Pin-Jui] So do you. You should rest up,
or else Old Li is going to pick on you again tomorrow.
translation.de: sonst meckert der alte Li wieder an dir rum.

translation.en: Well, we can both agree that we don't like Old Li.
translation.de: Einigen wir uns darauf, dass wir den alten Li nicht mögen.

translation.en: [Angela in English] You didn't do your dishes before you left.
translation.de: Du hast vor der Abreise nicht abgespült.

translation.en: I can help you with them.
No, it's okay.
I'll do it later.
I'm sorry about Grandma.
Thank you.
Are you all right?
I know this is a hard time for you,
translation.de: Ich weiß, es ist eine schwere Zeit,

translation.en: but I really wish you had told me about the funeral.
translation.de: aber ich wünschte, du hättest mir vom Begräbnis erzählt.

translation.en: It was a small ceremony.
She was my grandmother.
You didn't really know her. You never visited.
translation.de: Du hast sie nicht gekannt, nie besucht.

translation.en: The last time you were in Taiwan
was when I took you and your brother when you were kids.
translation.de: mit mir und deinem Bruder in Taiwan, als Kinder.

translation.en: That's true.
It's a long trip. Very far away.
translation.de: Es ist eine lange Reise. Sehr weit.

translation.en: And I know you're busy at work.
You never talked much about her.
translation.de: Du hast nie viel über sie gesprochen.

translation.en: What she was like.
Are you sure you don't want help with the dishes?
translation.de: Willst du sicher keine Hilfe beim Spülen?

translation.en: -No. -It would only take me a second.
I'm fine.
Thank you for the ride.
Say hello to Eric for me.
Okay.
[Pin-Jui in Mandarin] My mother and I worked in the factory every day.
translation.de: Meine Mutter und ich arbeiteten jeden Tag in der Fabrik.

translation.en: It was very hard work.
Sometimes, I wasn't sure if I would make it through the day.
translation.de: Manchmal wusste ich nicht, ob ich den Tag überleben würde.

translation.en: [Pin-Jui] Sorry.
No.
[chuckling] No.
-Hey, I think those are my gloves. -[Minghua laughs]
I've got something to talk to you about. Walk with me.
translation.de: Ich muss etwas mit dir besprechen. Komm mit.

translation.en: I've heard you're interested in going to America. Is that true?
translation.de: Du möchtest nach Amerika gehen. Ist das wahr?

translation.en: It's okay. You can tell me.
translation.de: Schon ok. Du kannst es mir sagen.

translation.en: -Yes. It's a dream of mine. -Mmm-hmm.
[Old Li] It's a good goal. Many opportunities there.
translation.de: Es ist ein gutes Ziel. Dort gibt es viele Chancen.

translation.en: Very expensive to go, though. How will you get there?
translation.de: Aber die Reise ist sehr teuer. Wie kommst du hin?

translation.en: I don't know.
No, thank you.
I have a daughter, Zhenzhen.
We've been looking for someone dependable for her.
translation.de: Wir suchen jemand Verlässliches für sie.

translation.en: Would you be interested in meeting her?
So, do you like going to school?
It's okay.
What do you want to do after you graduate?
I'm not sure.
Maybe become a nurse or a teacher.
Food's not bad, huh?
[Yuan] You're late.
I'm sorry.
[Yuan] Where were you?
Nowhere. I lost track of time.
translation.de: Nirgends. Ich habe die Zeit vergessen.

translation.en: And then I had to stop and pick up this.
You didn't steal that, did you?
translation.de: Den hast du nicht gestohlen, oder?

translation.en: I've heard you go to restaurants and leave without paying.
translation.de: Ich höre, du isst in Restaurants und gehst, ohne zu zahlen.

translation.en: I only do that when I'm with my girlfriend.
translation.de: Das mache ich nur, wenn meine Freundin dabei ist.

translation.en: She's a bad influence!
[Pin-Jui] This is nice.
Yeah.
You know who I heard on the radio today?
translation.de: Weißt du, wen ich heute im Radio gehört habe?

translation.en: It's been stuck in my head all day.
translation.de: Es geht mir den ganzen Tag im Kopf rum.

translation.en: [Pin-Jui in Mandarin] You have a beautiful voice.
So do you.
You should be a singer.
Maybe in another life.
Where were you earlier?
I was at home.
It's not like you to be late.
translation.de: Du kommst sonst nie zu spät.

translation.en: Were you with somebody else?
[Pin-Jui] No.
Don't be silly.
I'm just asking.
Do you want to see where I live?
translation.de: Willst du sehen, wo ich wohne?

translation.en: Told you it was fancy.
Do you like it?
I like it.
[Angela in English] Do you like the apartment?
It's very nice.
Sure you can afford it?
Yeah.
Is this about Eric's job again?
translation.de: Geht es wieder um Erics Arbeit?

translation.en: I would just feel more comfortable
if you were with someone who could support you.
translation.de: wenn du jemanden hättest, der dich unterstützt.

translation.en: Money's not the only important thing in a relationship.
translation.de: Geld ist nicht das Einzige in einer Beziehung.

translation.en: It's very important.
You're too young.
You don't really know what's important yet.
translation.de: Du weißt noch nicht, was wichtig ist.

translation.en: And you do?
More than you.
I don't know why you think you're the one to give advice.
It's not like your marriage turned out perfect.
translation.de: Deine Ehe war auch nicht perfekt.

translation.en: He's not very ambitious.
He should work harder. He's not like you.
translation.de: Er sollte härter arbeiten. Er ist nicht wie du.

translation.en: Maybe that's good.
I could use some balance in my life.
It's too soon.
We've been together for eight months.
translation.de: Wir sind seit acht Monaten zusammen.

translation.en: That's not very long.
You don't know him well enough.
I know he's a good person.
He makes me happy.
You really think that's enough?
We're getting married. I don't know what else there is to say.
translation.de: Wir heiraten. Was soll ich sonst noch sagen?

translation.en: -Don't go so fast. Take your time. -[Minghua] [ It's fine. ]
translation.de: -Nicht so schnell. Lass dir Zeit. -[ Schon gut. ]

translation.en: -[Pin-Jui] Slow down, take it easy. -[Minghua] [ Leave me alone! ]
-[exhales sharply] -Are you okay?
You've got to fix these machines! They don't stop!
translation.de: Ihr müsst die Maschinen reparieren! Die halten nicht an!

translation.en: Are you sure you're okay?
-I'll go get a bandage. -[ I'm fine. ]
translation.de: -Ich hole einen Verband. -[ Es geht mir gut. ]

translation.en: That job is too dangerous.
Those machines are old and broken. You shouldn't have to work there anymore.
translation.de: Die Maschinen sind alt und kaputt. Du solltest da nicht mehr arbeiten.

translation.en: No, you don't. It's miserable there.
You complain every day.
What if I made enough money so you could retire and live somewhere else?
translation.de: Und wenn ich genug Geld verdiene und du in Rente gehen und woanders leben kannst?

translation.en: -[Pin-Jui] You can get in. -All right.
I'll send for you when I get settled.
translation.de: Ich hole dich nach, wenn ich eine Wohnung habe.

translation.en: Bye, Ma.
[in Mandarin] Hello?
[Zhenzhen] Pin-Jui?
It's Zhenzhen.
Hello.
I know it's been a long time since we've spoken.
translation.de: Ich weiß, wir haben lange nicht geredet.

translation.en: I just talked to Angela.
She told me your mother passed away.
translation.de: Sie sagte, deine Mutter sei gestorben.

translation.en: I'm sorry to hear that.
translation.de: Tut mir leid, das zu hören.

translation.en: Thank you.
How are you?
I'm okay.
She lived a long life.
I know you cared about her very much.
translation.de: Ich weiß, sie war dir sehr wichtig.

translation.en: Angela said you didn't tell her about the service.
translation.de: Angela sagte, du hast ihr nichts von der Andacht erzählt.

translation.en: Why not?
She's very busy with work.
I didn't want to bother her.
She works too much. She's never at home.
translation.de: Sie arbeitet zu viel. Sie ist nie daheim.

translation.en: I'm worried.
I think she's having a hard time.
translation.de: Ich glaube, sie tut sich schwer.

translation.en: I didn't know that.
Maybe it would help if you talked to her more.
translation.de: Vielleicht solltest du mehr mit ihr reden.

translation.en: We live separate lives.
You're very hard on her.
translation.de: Du bist sehr hart zu ihr.

translation.en: I'm not hard on her. I only want what's best for her.
translation.de: Bin ich nicht. Ich will nur das Beste für sie.

translation.en: That may be your intention, but it's not the way it seems to her.
translation.de: Das mag deine Absicht sein, doch so erscheint es ihr nicht.

translation.en: Think about it.
You should see her more.
She's your only daughter.
Don't cry.
Crying never solves anything.
Be strong.
[Pin-Jui] When we arrived in America, it wasn't exactly as I had pictured it.
translation.de: Als wir in Amerika ankamen, war es nicht so wie in meiner Fantasie.

translation.en: But I had made my choice.
There was no turning back now.
Uh... There's a window.
Should we go out to eat to celebrate?
translation.de: Wollen wir essen gehen und feiern?

translation.en: Okay.
We can't afford this.
translation.de: Das können wir uns nicht leisten.

translation.en: It is very expensive.
This is embarrassing.
It's okay.
We don't have to eat here.
Let's go.
Uh... Do you dance at all?
Um... Not really.
I get too embarrassed.
Do you?
I used to. Sometimes. [chuckles softly]
Do you want to dance?
Um... No, it's okay.
[Zhenzhen] Excuse me.
Are you Taiwanese?
-Yes. Why? -Oh.
Uh, I just moved here.
I don't know anyone in the city.
Not very many Taiwanese people here.
Mostly black or Puerto Rican.
I thought maybe you were Korean.
No. I'm from central Taiwan.
I'm from Zhongli.
-Oh. -[Peijing] Thank God you're not Korean.
translation.de: Zum Glück sind Sie nicht aus Korea.

translation.en: I have Korean neighbors.
They're very loud and they cook kimchi all day long.
translation.de: Sie sind sehr laut und kochen ständig Kimchi.

translation.en: Stinks up the whole building.
I haven't talked to anyone besides my husband in a long time.
translation.de: Ich habe lange mit niemandem geredet, außer mit meinem Mann.

translation.en: Do you like him at least?
He's okay. He has to work a lot.
translation.de: Er ist ok. Er muss viel arbeiten.

translation.en: I get so bored in the apartment.
translation.de: Ich langweile mich so in der Wohnung.

translation.en: Nothing to do but clean and sit on the couch by myself.
translation.de: Es gibt nichts zu tun, außer zu putzen und allein auf dem Sofa zu sitzen.

translation.en: I actually come to the laundromat with small loads just to see other people.
translation.de: Ich komme extra mit kleinen Ladungen in den Waschsalon, um andere zu sehen.

translation.en: That's very sad.
I know.
Come have tea with me.
translation.de: Trinken Sie einen Tee mit mir.

translation.en: Always good to have someone to speak Mandarin with.
translation.de: Es ist immer gut, mit jemandem Mandarin zu sprechen.

translation.en: [Zhenzhen] Okay.
You're back.
[Zhenzhen] Yeah.
How's Peijing?
She's okay. She sprained her ankle last week.
translation.de: Gut. Sie hat sich letzte Woche den Knöchel verstaucht.

translation.en: Again? Didn't she do that a month ago?
translation.de: Schon wieder? Das war doch erst vor einem Monat?

translation.en: Yeah.
The doctor gave her a funny boot to walk around in this time.
translation.de: Diesmal bekam sie vom Arzt einen komischen Stiefel zum Anziehen.

translation.en: That's too bad.
-Should I make us something to eat? -[Pin-Jui] Wait...
First, I want to show you something.
translation.de: Ich will dir zuerst was zeigen.

translation.en: Do you like it?
I know I haven't been home very much,
translation.de: Ich weiß, ich war nicht viel zu Hause,

translation.en: and you haven't had the easiest time adjusting to America.
translation.de: du hattest es nicht leicht, dich in Amerika einzugewöhnen.

translation.en: It's okay.
I thought maybe we could learn how to play together.
translation.de: Ich dachte, wir könnten lernen, wie man spielt.

translation.en: Thank you.
What should I make us tonight?
Mapo tofu?
Sure.
-[Zhenzhen] I'll go make it now. -Mmm.
You know how to play already!
translation.de: Du weißt schon, wie man spielt!

translation.en: -I learned it just while you were out... -[chuckles softly]
[Peijing] Here. Eat some more.
[Zhenzhen] Thank you.
It's even worse since he took over the store.
translation.de: Es ist noch schlimmer, seit er den Laden übernommen hat.

translation.en: He's always tired.
He never wants to go out or do anything.
translation.de: Er will nie weggehen oder etwas unternehmen.

translation.en: You've been married for a while.
Of course he doesn't make an effort anymore.
translation.de: Klar bemüht er sich nicht mehr.

translation.en: At least he's still handsome.
translation.de: Wenigstens sieht er noch gut aus.

translation.en: Look at this guy.
You're not winning any beauty pageants.
We don't have anything in common.
Eventually, your life together is what you'll have in common.
translation.de: Letztendlich werdet ihr nur euer Leben gemeinsam haben.

translation.en: Maybe. It hasn't happened yet.
translation.de: Vielleicht. Noch ist es nicht so.

translation.en: What'd you put in this meatball? It tastes like shit.
translation.de: Was ist in diesem Fleischbällchen? Es schmeckt nach Mist.

translation.en: Then cook it yourself. Quit your whining.
translation.de: Dann koch selbst. Hör auf zu jammern.

translation.en: [Pin-Jui] We're ready for you.
The apartment's ready. Everything's ready.
translation.de: Die Wohnung ist bereit. Alles ist bereit.

translation.en: I told you already.
It's not big, but it's bigger than your house.
translation.de: Es ist nicht groß, aber größer als dein Haus.

translation.en: You wouldn't have to do anything. You could retire, like we talked about.
translation.de: Du müsstest nichts mehr tun. Du wärst in Rente, wie besprochen.

translation.en: I didn't either, but you can meet people once you're here.
translation.de: Ich zuerst auch nicht, aber du lernst Leute kennen.

translation.en: We talked about this before I left.
I thought this is what you wanted.
Where were you?
I went to Peijing's for dinner.
translation.de: Ich war bei Peijing zum Essen.

translation.en: You didn't tell me.
I thought you'd be at work. I lost track of time.
translation.de: Ich dachte, du arbeitest. Ich habe die Zeit vergessen.

translation.en: There was no food in the house.
translation.de: Es war nichts zu essen da.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
Peijing thinks if I go to school for just a few years,
translation.de: Peijing meint, wenn ich ein paar Jahre zur Schule gehe,

translation.en: I can get a teaching credential.
What for?
Then maybe I could become a teacher.
Forget about it.
After we have kids, you won't have time to work anyway.
translation.de: Wenn wir Kinder haben, hast du keine Zeit mehr.

translation.en: Well, we don't have them yet.
Screw him!
Just take the classes and see what happens.
translation.de: Mach die Ausbildung und schau, was passiert.

translation.en: Mmm. I think you're right.
I'll look into when they start.
translation.de: Ich sehe nach, wann sie anfängt.

translation.en: Good. You won't regret it.
translation.de: Gut. Du wirst es nicht bereuen.

translation.en: Let's go get ice cream.
Again? Aren't you worried you'll get fat?
translation.de: Noch eins? Hast du keine Angst, fett zu werden?

translation.en: I'm already married. Who gives a shit?
translation.de: Ich bin verheiratet. Kümmert mich einen Scheiß.

translation.en: Do you want to pack these?
No. You can throw them out.
Okay.
-[in English] Are you done? -Yes.
Is something wrong?
You asked me to have lunch with you.
And I appreciate that.
But then, after we sat down, you just...
sat there for an hour and barely said anything.
translation.de: ...hast du eine Stunde lang kaum was gesagt.

translation.en: Didn't seem like you wanted to talk.
translation.de: Sah nicht aus, als wolltest du reden.

translation.en: How you doing?
Is everything okay?
[shakily] Yeah. I'm fine.
Actually, that's not true. I'm not fine.
translation.de: Ist nicht wahr. Es geht mir nicht gut.

translation.en: Eric left me.
I don't think he's coming back.
I'm sorry.
It's been really hard.
And the worst part is...
I think it was my fault.
translation.de: Ich glaube, es war meine Schuld.

translation.en: Are you gonna say anything?
Sounds difficult.
What else is there to say?
translation.de: Was gibt es da zu sagen?

translation.en: I don't know.
Something.
Didn't you go through the same thing with Mom?
translation.de: Hast du mit Mama nicht dasselbe erlebt?

translation.en: It was different.
I wouldn't know because you never told me what happened.
translation.de: Keine Ahnung, du hast es mir nie erzählt.

translation.en: [Pin-Jui] Would that help?
Why can't you just say something nice?
You could try to make me feel better.
You could tell me that everything's gonna be okay.
translation.de: Du könntest sagen, es wird alles gut.

translation.en: All I ever wanted, my whole life...
translation.de: Alles, was ich je wollte, mein Leben lang,

translation.en: was to feel like I had someone
who cared about me, no matter what happened.
translation.de: dem ich was bedeute, egal, was geschieht.

translation.en: I never got that from you.
translation.de: Von dir habe ich das nie bekommen.

translation.en: You're my father.
I don't even know how to talk to you. I never have.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht mal, wie ich mit dir reden kann.

translation.en: Maybe it's easier if we just stop trying.
translation.de: Vielleicht sollten wir es nicht länger versuchen.

translation.en: [in Mandarin] What happened to the hedges out front?
translation.de: Was ist mit der Hecke passiert?

translation.en: I told the gardeners they could trim them.
translation.de: Ich hab die Gärtner gebeten, sie zu schneiden.

translation.en: Why did you do that?
They trimmed too much.
You weren't here. I didn't know what you wanted.
translation.de: Du warst nicht da. Ich wusste nicht, was du willst.

translation.en: They look terrible. How could you not know?
translation.de: Es sieht schlimm aus. Du wusstest es nicht?

translation.en: Hey. They'll take forever to grow back now.
translation.de: Das dauert ewig, bis es nachwächst.

translation.en: I don't want to be with you anymore.
What?
I want a divorce.
No, you don't.
Don't tell me what I want.
translation.de: Sag mir nicht, was ich will.

translation.en: I'm leaving.
You're acting crazy. Go to sleep.
The kids are gone.
I only stayed for them.
-This is my house. You do what I say. -I don't care about your stupid house.
translation.de: -Das ist mein Haus. Du tust, was ich sage. -Dein blödes Haus ist mir egal.

translation.en: I've made up my mind. I'm leaving.
translation.de: Ich habe mich entschlossen. Ich gehe.

translation.en: You treat me like a servant.
translation.de: Du behandelst mich wie eine Dienerin.

translation.en: I give you everything. Nice clothes, a nice car.
translation.de: Ich gebe dir alles. Schöne Kleidung, ein schönes Auto.

translation.en: I don't care about that stuff.
Oh, I see.
You're spoiled by America.
That's not how we do things.
Don't forget, I was the one who brought you here.
translation.de: Vergiss nicht, ich habe dich hergebracht.

translation.en: My dad paid for it.
You had nothing.
Yes, I came here with nothing.
And I built all of this myself, while you stayed at home.
translation.de: Ich habe all das aufgebaut. Du warst daheim.

translation.en: I raised our children while you were never home.
translation.de: Ich habe unsere Kinder erzogen. Du warst nie da.

translation.en: Where were you all those nights? Where?
translation.de: Wo warst du an all diesen Abenden? Wo?

translation.en: I never cheated on you.
It doesn't matter.
You take me for granted.
translation.de: Du siehst mich als selbstverständlich an.

translation.en: I'm leaving.
Good! Get out. I never wanted to marry you.
translation.de: Gut! Verschwinde. Ich wollte dich nie heiraten.

translation.en: Go.
I used to think you could learn to care about anyone other than yourself.
translation.de: Ich dachte immer, du könntest lernen, nicht nur an dich zu denken.

translation.en: But you can't.
And you never will.
You're broken inside.
If I could travel back in time,
I would go back to the moment I met you
translation.de: würde ich zu unserem ersten Treffen reisen

translation.en: and run far away.
So far that I would never see you again.
translation.de: Um dich nie mehr zu sehen.

translation.en: -[Pin-Jui] Yuan? -Pin-Jui?
[Pin-Jui] Yes. It's me.
Did you get taller?
[chuckles] I think you shrank, old man!
translation.de: Du bist wohl geschrumpft, alter Mann!

translation.en: [chuckles] Probably. Here, come sit.
-How was your trip in? -Not bad.
New York is amazing. Much more exciting than Maryland!
translation.de: New York ist toll. Viel aufregender als Maryland!

translation.en: Is the weather always this nice in the spring?
translation.de: Ist das Wetter im Frühling hier immer so schön?

translation.en: Usually, yes.
Maybe I should spend more time here.
-You definitely should. -[chuckles]
Hey, they have spicy beef noodle soup here.
Do you still like it?
-Should we get some? -Of course!
This is delicious.
You have such good Chinese food here.
translation.de: Ihr habt hier so gutes chinesisches Essen.

translation.en: Yes. Another perk of living here.
translation.de: Ja. Noch ein Bonus, wenn man hier lebt.

translation.en: Should we run away without paying like we did at Yuelu?
translation.de: Wollen wir weglaufen, ohne zu zahlen, wie damals im Yuelu?

translation.en: It would be fun... but I have money to pay now.
translation.de: Das wäre lustig... aber heute habe ich Geld.

translation.en: You used to be so crazy.
You were crazier.
I was just doing crazy stuff to impress you.
You scared me.
We were bad for each other.
I don't think so.
Can I ask you something?
Of course.
The day I left, I was in the back of a car leaving town.
translation.de: Als ich damals abreiste, saß ich auf dem Rücksitz eines Wagens.

translation.en: I thought I saw you out the window. Was that you?
translation.de: Ich dachte, ich hätte dich noch gesehen. Warst du das?

translation.en: Yes.
I thought it was you.
But when I looked back, you were gone.
translation.de: Aber als ich zurückschaute, warst du weg.

translation.en: I didn't know if I was dreaming or not.
translation.de: Ich wusste nicht, ob ich träumte.

translation.en: I saw you.
But I couldn't bear to watch you go, so I left.
translation.de: Aber ich ertrug es nicht, dich wegfahren zu sehen, da ging ich.

translation.en: It's a shame.
Can I ask you something?
It's so long ago, I feel like I can finally ask.
translation.de: Es ist so lange her, ich kann dich endlich fragen.

translation.en: Why didn't you tell me you were leaving?
translation.de: Warum hast du nicht gesagt, dass du gehst?

translation.en: I had to find out where you went from neighborhood gossip.
translation.de: Ich erfuhr es durch den Tratsch der Nachbarn.

translation.en: What good would it have done?
What would have changed?
I guess we'll never know.
You seem to have a good life now.
translation.de: Du scheinst ein gutes Leben zu haben.

translation.en: It's not bad.
My husband just retired.
translation.de: Mein Mann ist jetzt in Rente.

translation.en: We have a lot of time on our own now.
translation.de: Wir haben viel Zeit für uns.

translation.en: That's nice.
-And you? -Hmm?
How are your kids?
Good. Bobby has a band that's done very well.
translation.de: Gut. Bobby hat eine erfolgreiche Band.

translation.en: He just got back from a tour in Europe.
What about Angela?
She's having a harder time.
translation.de: Sie hat es im Moment schwerer.

translation.en: She works too much.
She has trouble getting along with people.
translation.de: Sie kommt nicht gut mit Menschen klar.

translation.en: I don't know how to talk to her.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, wie ich mit ihr reden soll.

translation.en: She's very stubborn.
You should know something about that.
Maybe before she opens up, she needs you to open up to her first.
translation.de: Vielleicht musst du dich ihr öffnen, bevor sie sich dir öffnet.

translation.en: It's never too late.
This was fun. Thank you for lunch.
You're welcome. It was good to see you.
translation.de: Gerne. Es war schön, dich zu sehen.

translation.en: -[Yuan] Bye. -Bye.
[in English] Hi, everybody.
I just wanted to say a little something.
translation.de: Ich möchte ein paar Worte sagen.

translation.en: As you know, this hasn't been the easiest year for me,
translation.de: Wie ihr wisst, war dieses Jahr nicht einfach für mich,

translation.en: but it really means a lot to see all your faces again,
translation.de: aber es bedeutet mir viel, euch wiederzusehen

translation.en: and be able to celebrate together. Thank you so much for coming.
translation.de: und mit euch feiern zu können. Vielen Dank, dass ihr da seid.

translation.en: Happy Chinese New Year.
[all] Happy New Year.
Do you want anything else to drink? Wine?
translation.de: Möchtest du noch was trinken? Wein?

translation.en: No. Tea's fine.
Okay.
-Here you go. Of course. -[man] Thank you.
I'm so glad you guys could make it out here for the party.
translation.de: Wie schön, dass ihr kommen konntet.

translation.en: You should visit more often.
It's hard for me to miss work. My students miss me! [chuckles]
translation.de: Die Arbeit hält mich ab. Meine Studenten vermissen mich!

translation.en: I substitute for her sometimes.
translation.de: Ich springe ab und zu für sie ein.

translation.en: They love her. They think she's very funny.
translation.de: Sie lieben sie. Sie finden sie sehr witzig.

translation.en: I'm sure they do. Are you guys traveling anywhere this year?
translation.de: Das glaube ich. Verreist ihr dieses Jahr noch?

translation.en: For spring break, we're gonna go to Costa Rica
translation.de: Im Frühling fahren wir nach Costa Rica

translation.en: and then, in the summer, we go back to Croatia.
Wow! That sounds really fun.
-Yeah. -We can't wait.
I thought you'd left.
No.
You don't have to help. I got it.
translation.de: Du musst mir nicht helfen. Ich schaffe das.

translation.en: It's okay.
Thanks.
I can do the rest.
Why don't you go to the dining room? I'll make us some tea.
translation.de: Geh doch ins Esszimmer. Ich mache uns Tee.

translation.en: Okay.
Mom seems happy.
I'm glad for her.
This is the first time I've hosted this party by myself,
translation.de: Es war das erste Mal, dass ich die Party allein gab,

translation.en: without Eric.
Sometimes, I wonder if I'll ever find anyone like him again.
translation.de: Ob ich je wieder jemanden wie ihn finde?

translation.en: When we were together...
it just felt different.
Do you know what I mean?
There was a woman once.
I knew her before your mother.
translation.de: Ich kannte sie vor deiner Mutter.

translation.en: I didn't know that.
There are many things I never told you.
translation.de: Ich habe dir vieles nie erzählt.

translation.en: What did you do after Mom left?
translation.de: Was hast du getan, als Mama ging?

translation.en: I went home.
[Pin-Jui in Mandarin] My father died when I was a year old.
translation.de: Mein Vater starb, als ich ein Jahr alt war.

translation.en: My mother left me with my grandparents, who lived in the rice fields.
translation.de: Sie ließ mich bei meinen Großeltern, die in den Reisfeldern lebten.

translation.en: I worked here with my mother for several years.
translation.de: Ich arbeitete mit meiner Mutter mehrere Jahre hier.

translation.en: It was hard work, but I was grateful that we were together.
translation.de: Es war harte Arbeit, aber ich war dankbar, dass wir zusammen waren.

translation.en: Your grandmother was a very strong woman.
translation.de: Deine Großmutter war eine sehr starke Frau.

translation.en: Like you.
We walked home together on this path every day.
translation.de: Jeden Tag gingen wir auf diesem Weg nach Hause.

translation.en: This was our house.
It didn't look like this the last time I was here.
translation.de: Letztes Mal sah es nicht so aus.

translation.en: There was a bar down there.
The girl and I used to go there to dance.
translation.de: Sie und ich haben dort getanzt.

translation.en: What was her name?
